snippet: On the south shore, two extraordinary chefs joined Lo for a day of paddling kayaks through the bay, digging for soft-shell clams and throwing together a summery feast.
lead_paragraph: On the south shore, two extraordinary chefs joined Lo for a day of paddling kayaks through the bay, digging for soft-shell clams and throwing together a summery feast.

headline.main: A Summer Clam Feast at the Long Island Home of the Chef Anita Lo
